short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhancing the process of creating Yoto Make Your Own cards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions adds functionality to the Yoto Make Your Own interface to make it easier and quicker to create your own playlists.

Features:
- Auto number your tracks
- Assign random icons to all tracks
- Integration with YotoIcons.com
- Covert art suggester
- Icon filtering
- Playlist filtering and sorting
- Download MYO Tracks and Playlists
- Import tracks from other MYO Playlists to create mix tapes
- Auto-save, auto-number and auto-random icons after audio has uploaded
- Cover art print helper
- Yoto Store & club collection covert art print helper
- Multi-track icon select and move.
- Playlist sharing
- AI Icon Suggestions
